#Text=Increase Revenue in a Hair Salon
#Text=There are all kinds of ways hair salon owners can adjust their business plans in order to boost earnings .
#Text=Do you happen to own or work at a hair salon ?
#Text=If so , you 'll surely want to check out these 7 simple steps you can use to help increase revenue .
#Text=Steps
#Text=Design Gift Cards For Your Customers
#Text=There are all kinds of websites and companies which give you the ability to create custom gift cards for your salon .
#Text=Do n't necessarily have the extra funds to have personalized gift cards made ?
#Text=You definitely could always look at making your own salon gift certificates .
#Text=If you choose to go this route , make sure you use a unique paper or design to ensure you 're able to authenticate them .
#Text=Creating your own cards allows room for more creativity , but professional gift cards will undoubtedly impress your customers .
#Text=Start a Customer Loyalty Program
#Text=Another great way to increase the revenue of your hair salon is by creating a customer loyalty program .
#Text=These special programs reward clients for booking multiple appointments or purchasing a certain dollar amount of services within a designated time frame .
#Text=One of the best ways to create your own customer loyalty program is by designing your own cards that you can punch out a spot on each time a customer comes in for a hair service .
#Text=To eliminate the expense of creating cards all together , you could even look at having your salon receptionist keep a customer log on the computer .
#Text=This will ensure that each and every salon client gets their rightful loyalty rewards .
#Text=Build a Client List
#Text=It is extremely helpful to have an established list of regular clientele with their complete contact information .
#Text=In order to begin building your client list , have stylists ask clients who come in to the salon for their email and phone number .
#Text=If you have the contact information of your clients , you can then easily send out email newsletters notifying them of sales and promotions .
#Text=You could also even have your receptionist occasionally give them a call to let them know about special offers .
#Text=Offer Hair Care Products
#Text=Not every client is going to be able to make it to the salon once or twice a week .
#Text=Most of them are going to want to know how he or she can create the particular look you gave them when doing their own hair .
#Text=This is why you definitely want to sell the products you and other stylists use to style hair in the salon .
#Text=It 's recommended you set up a display case with a number of smaller bottles that your clients can purchase and take home with them .
#Text=Expand Your Services
#Text=To raise the revenue of your salon , you may also want to expand the services you offer .
#Text=If you only offer hair services at the moment , maybe look at finding a makeup artist , masseuse , or nail technician for clients who want to purchase a complete makeover package .
#Text=Ask For Feedback
#Text=The best way to find out what you can do to improve the earnings of your salon is to ask your clients .
#Text=You should do this by creating feedback forms and asking clients to rate specific aspects of their salon experience .
#Text=Use Social Media
#Text=In today 's business world , the use of social media is a wonderful way to reach new potential clients and stay in touch with clients you have already serviced .
#Text=You definitely want to make sure your salon has a presence on the biggest social media sites such as Facebook , Instagram and Twitter .
#Text=Post a few pictures of your best hair creations to have new clients coming in and contacting you to book appointments in no time .
